column1: '''The Lord of the Rings: The Motion Picture Trilogy - Extended Edition''' is a Blu-ray pack of [[The Lord of the Rings (film series)|''The Lord of the Rings'' film series]] released on June 28
column2: 2011 by [[New Line Cinema]]. It includes the extended editions of the films in high-definition and nine DVDs of bonus features. ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring|The Fellowship of the Ring]]'' also received a remaster from the 2K digital files
column3: supervised by director [[Peter Jackson]] and cinematographer [[Andrew Lesnie]].
